item.title: Hugo usage issues summary
item.description: Usage scene In my github repo initialize two repos One to storage Hugo sourcecode and markdown files And other one use release finaly site resources Has two folders themes and public as github submodes 1 git submodule add https://github.com/don.chen/DbConnector 2 git submodule update --init

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: About
item.description: I have 13 years of working experience in the IT industry in China from Qbasic language in high school to Foxbase,PowerBuilder and other traditional C/S software development tool sets. With the vigorous development of Internet, ASP language has been used to make dynamic website since 2002. Later, I turned to PHP, a powerful WEB development language, and led the development of Online education websites. Around 2011, as Java becomes more and more powerful in the web development space.
